messages.subject: Another (at your own risk!) yahoogroup
messages.msgSnippet: For all of us who enjoy the craziness of our lives as homeschooling parents, and want to share the enthusiasm and insanity with others with a whacked
messages.messageBody:
"For all of us who enjoy the craziness of our lives
as homeschooling parents, and want to share the enthusiasm and insanity with
others with a whacked personality. This is the place where you can relax,
joke about the day, offer tips, glean insights, and just enjoy the company
of other parents intensely invovled with homeschooling and who want to take
an e-break! "

This group has been established by DJ Brewer, a mother of four and house-mom
of over a dozen more, someone I've known for many years and one who does not
[how shall we say...] stand on ceremony or watch her language. I'm over
there.

DJ's not a full-on unschooler, but she has unschooling leanings and symptoms.
Her mom lives south of Albuquerque and she used to be in on lots of the AOL
chats, and that's why we know each other. She sent this for me to pass on:

Dear Sandra
Can you post this new group I started on a few of the elists you belong to?
I am sure it will spark some interest. And if people have too many lists
and don't want to belong to it and it dies, who the hell cares! I don't!

imhn
DJ
